== Thrikkovilvattom (CT) (628446) ==

Thrikkovilvattom (CT) is a town in the [[Kollam]] taluka of [[Kollam]] district with an area of 12.99 sq. km. and harbouring 10059 households with total population of 41609 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kollam]] is at a distance of 14 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 72 km. Male population is 20012 and female population is 21597. Scheduled Caste population is 4981 and Scheduled Tribes population is 93. Census Location Code of the town is 628446<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kollam (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 14 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Thiruvananthapuarm (m corp. + og) at a distance of 72 km. Railway station is at Kollam at a distance of 14 km.
